member.name: D3D11_KEY_EXCHANGE_HW_PROTECTION_INPUT_DATA
member.summary: Represents key exchange input data for hardware content protection.

member.name: D3D11_KEY_EXCHANGE_HW_PROTECTION_INPUT_DATA.PrivateDataSize
member.summary: The size of the private data reserved for IHV usage. This size is determined from the pPrivateInputSize parameter returned by the function.

member.name: D3D11_KEY_EXCHANGE_HW_PROTECTION_INPUT_DATA.HWProtectionDataSize
member.summary: The size of the DRM command data.

summary.para: If PrivateDataSize is greater than 0, pbInput[0] – pbInput[PrivateDataSize - 1] is reserved for IHV use.
pbInput[PrivateDataSize] – pbInput[HWProtectionDataSize + PrivateDataSize - 1] contains the input data for the DRM command. The format and size of the DRM command is defined by the DRM specification.
